price: 3. Nous lui avons indiqué le droit chemin, qu’il fût reconnaissant ou ingrat.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
